titles.title: Quindaro Townsite National Commemorative Site Act
Quindaro Townsite National Commemorative Site Act
To designate the Quindaro Townsite in Kansas City, Kansas, as a National Commemorative Site.
Quindaro Townsite National Commemorative Site Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Quindaro Townsite National Commemorative Site Act
This bill designates the Quindaro Townsite in Kansas City, Kansas, which is associated with the the Bleeding Kansas conflict of 1854-1861 and the Underground Railroad, as the Quindaro Townsite National Commemorative Site.
